name: Decker Drop
description:
Designed for #Cyberpunkjam Spring 2014, Decker Drop is a vertical platformer that places you in the role of a Free Diver named Punker. Punker has made his way into megacorp's secret complex, but now he must dive down endless shafts to reach the lower bowels of the complex. Armed with his electro-baton, hacking skills, and an array of "fun candy", he must make his way past alarms, drones, and doors.

Can you survive the drop?

Decker Drop was designed by Stanley Kramer and James Shepherd. Stanley made the art using Photoshop and James coded the game in Game Maker Studio.
